name: Travel Bottle Set
description: TSA-approved 4-piece travel bottle set suitable for travel toiletries and cosmetics.

name: Universal Adapter
description: All-in-one universal travel adapter with charging ports for USA, EU, UK, and AUS.

description: Light suction cup, attachable to any flat surface, that can hold a weight of up to 10 lbs.

description: Accurate home and travel luggage scale displaying weights of up to 77 lbs. (35 kg).
